name: Weather
description: This plugin get weather conditions (live, forecast) from the inline service OpenWeather (no sensor needed)

apiKey.name: API key
apiKey.description: This key is needed and provided by sign up on [OpenWeather website](https://openweathermap.org/appid) (free)

useSpecificLocation.name: Use a specific location
useSpecificLocation.description: Use this option if default location provided by Yadoms is not accurate

pluginState.lastRequestFailed: Unable to connect to service ({{error}}), will retry later...
